hero.pre_cta: Discover the truth. Track down stolen bikes with our epic image search.
hero.title: Did your bike get stolen?

report_form.title: Bike theft report
report_form.subtitle: Insert bike theft related data, they will be added to the search engine

bike_brand.title: Stolen bike brand
bike_brand.subtitle: Search the brand name, if you don't find it, you can type it in. If you don't know it, leave this field blank.

colors.title: Bike main colors
colors.subtitle: Bike frame colors, add each color separated by a comma.

approximate_value.title: Approximate value
approximate_value.subtitle: Type an approximate value of the bike, in {{currency}}:

theft_date.title: Theft date
theft_date.subtitle: Select the date when your bike was stolen, the more accurate, the better.

location.title: Address and coordinates
location.subtitle: Select a map point where the theft happened.
location.placeholder: IE: an address, a city, an street name. You can move the map marker to be more accurate

photos.title: You can add up to {{n}} photos

theft_timeframe.title: Day time frame
theft_timeframe.subtitle: Select an approximate time frame when your bike was stolen.

bike_details.title: Bike details.
bike_details.subtitle: Add any detail that can help make your bike recognizable.

enter_email.title: Email address
enter_email.subtitle: We will send you a verification link and use your email only for strictly related communication.
